laazotea.indi.server.examples

Class INDIBasicServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.server.AbstractINDIServer
      • laazotea.indi.server.DefaultINDIServer
        • laazotea.indi.server.examples.INDIBasicServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class INDIBasicServer
extends DefaultINDIServer
    A simple INDI Server that basically sends all messages from drivers and clients and viceversa, just performing basic checks of messages integrity. It allows to dinamically load / unload different kinds of Devices with simple shell commands.
    Version:
    1.32, July 23, 2013
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
